it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.view.gui

Class MainFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.view.gui.MainFrame

  • public class MainFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles every aspect about GUI. Creates the panel that compose the main panel setted with a border layout.
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio
